comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Second World War. Jews in Poland are being forced to work  (Making a street of cobblestones) while a soldier with a swastika on his arm guards them. August 1941

comment.author: 29998366@N02
comment._content:
Hartelijk dank. We zijn bezig met het verwerken van de reactie(s), ook op onze beeldbank. 
Hains Hamelink, Spaarnestad Photo (partner Nationaal Archief)
